channel.title: Ring on (fn [] "Less is more")
channel.description: Recent content in Ring on (fn [] "Less is more")

item.title: Ring으로 웹프로그래밍
item.description: ## Hello-Ring 프로젝트 작성 새로운 프로젝트를 생성한다 lein new hello-ring leiningen.clj project.clj의 :dependencies에 임베디드 Jetty서버 추가 [ring/ring-jetty-adapter "1.4.0"] ring-jetty-adapter는 ring-core, ring-servlet, jetty-server를 의존성으로 가지고 있다 ring-core: essential functions for handling parameters, cookies and more ring-devel: functions for developing and debugging Ring applications ring-servlet: construct Java servlets from Ring handlers ring-jetty-adapter: a Ring adapter that uses the Jetty webserver hello_ring.core (ns hello-ring.core (:use [ring.adapter.jetty])) (defn app-handler [request] {:status 200 :header {"Content-Type" "text/html"} :body "Hello Ring"}) (defn -main [] (run-jetty app-handler {:port 8080})) 실행
